name: FriendFinder Express App
description: This full-stack site will take in users' results from a survey, compare their answers with those from other users, and display the name and picture of the user with the best overall match. Built with Express and Javascript

name: Becca's Burgers
description: A restaurant app that lets users input the names of burgers they'd like to eat. Built with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade ORM (yum!)

name: NewzNotes Mongo Scraper
description: A Web App that lets users view and leave comments on the latest news. Built with Mongo, Cheerio, Express, Javascript

name: Bamazon Node Storefront
description: An Amazon-like storefront CLI App. Built using Node.js using MySQL and Javascript

name: LIRI Node App
description: LIRI is like iPhone's SIRI, except it is a Language Interpretation and Recognition Interface. LIRI is a command line node app that takes in parameters and gives you back data.

name: Britney Spears Top Hits Hangman
description: A Britney Spears themed, command-line Hangman game using javascript constructor functions.
